Summary



Volkswagen, Tata Motors call off partnership plansSubsidiary of Hinduja Ventures receives NCLT approval for demergerSpiceJet revenue up 23 percent to Rs 1,870 croreCochin Shipyard, India’s largest public sector shipbuilder, will list on stock exchanges

The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50’s performance in India fell 1.51 percent to 9,718.

title: Stocks To Watch: Cochin Shipyard, J Kumar Infra, SpiceJet, SBI, Tata Motors
